name: Sblaaf!!
description:
Play as Brook, a fierce dwarf miner. Punch your way through the tunnel (an old-fashioned method) to reach valuable ore !

HOW TO PLAY ?

⭐️ You must play in full screen (hd) ⭐️ 

- Move with the Left & Right arrow keys

- Punch with Space!

It is recommended to play the .exe version, as the web version may have some lags.

This prototype is our entry for the ludum dare 48, in Jam category !

Made by Lauréline Chambon (environment), Yanis Lhôte (character, VFX & UI), Théo Besson (dev, level design).

We hope you'll like it !

Credits :

- Music : Wind Rose - Diggy Diggy Hole
